@Jro: I have joined the third hub so that I can speak again .But when I follow someone ,the one will be in the list of 编程狗233 ,but when I talk to others .I will be 编程狗的博客 .Somewhere I will be another one. So just now .I can speak and reply ,I can follow but just like 3 men. Thanks a lot.
Welcome...But To know it ,it's better to go there .

@Jro: Same to you .When I register the 2ed hub I know I had made a mistake that I was re-register .I found I could not update  the avatar .So I delete the 2ed site...And then I could not speak anyway ... So I thought when I join a new hub,my info will write into the new ,then join another ,the newest info will write into the new one .To speak I joined the 3ed,it works! I would see the source code If I have time to find out the truth.
@12hlearn: Not good. If ssh connection is **closed**,ipfs would not be running under screen .

@12hlearn: Open a terminal ,type `screen` .open another terminal ,type `ps f|grep screen -B 2`. 
``` 
18712 pts/29   Ss     0:00 bash
18727 pts/29   S+     0:00  \_ screen
``` 
screen is running under bash.If bash is closed,screen is closed.
@12hlearn: Here [introduction to processes](http://linux-training.be/index.php?nav=sysadmin),I am translating this book from English to Chinese.
你可以试试下载国外的磁力链接，用国外的服务器下载，一般的种子速度都在2M/s以上。国内就不行了，这是依赖迅雷依赖各种云的后遗症。
没有谁可以封掉一个p2p产品。
删除文件夹也会导致数据错乱，更新他的时间让他不显示就好了。看我的脚本
